content.raw:
p.s.2 for `tunnel_circuit_practice_01` I get 1min report:

`0:01:00.024265 (13.3 -3.8 0.0) [('acc', 330), ('pose2d', 500), ('rot', 330), ('scan', 341), ('sim_time_sec', 34)]` … so IMU \(acc, rot\) is almost eh same as number of scans \(everything is downsampled to 10Hz\), simulated 34s

and for

`simple_tunnel_01` I had

`0:01:00.019073 (22.0 -3.5 0.0) [('acc', 467), ('pose2d', 536), ('rot', 467), ('scan', 538), ('sim_time_sec', 54)]` … in both case there is still issue with irregular odometry \(pose2d\), but that is disscused in separate issue.
content.html:
p.s.2 for tunnel_circuit_practice_01 I get 1min report:

0:01:00.024265 (13.3 -3.8 0.0) [('acc', 330), ('pose2d', 500), ('rot', 330), ('scan', 341), ('sim_time_sec', 34)] … so IMU (acc, rot) is almost eh same as number of scans (everything is downsampled to 10Hz), simulated 34s

and for

simple_tunnel_01 I had

0:01:00.019073 (22.0 -3.5 0.0) [('acc', 467), ('pose2d', 536), ('rot', 467), ('scan', 538), ('sim_time_sec', 54)] … in both case there is still issue with irregular odometry (pose2d), but that is disscused in separate issue.
